::: {.course-overview}
# Course Overview

This short course provides a basic introduction to Quarto. The goal is to get up and running, so that you can create simple Quarto documents. More on-the-fly learning will be needed as you start using Quarto more intensively.


:::


::: {.course-goals}
# Course Goals

* Understand what Quarto is.
* Be able to create basic documents using Quarto. 
* Be familiar with sources that you can use to learn more.



:::

::: {.course-prerequisites}
# Course Prerequisites

* We assume you have Positron up and running and can use it at the level covered in our [**Brief Introduction to Positron** course](fc1-intro-positron.qmd). 
* We further assume that you have R installed and can use it at the level covered in our [Brief Introduction to R course](fc2a-intro-r.qmd).
<!-- * We further assume that you have R and/or Julia installed and can use it at the level covered in our [Brief Introduction to R course](fc4-intro-r.qmd). -->

:::


::: {.course-content}
# Course Content

The course covers these topics (and more):

- Introduction
- Install and Setup
- Basic Functionality 
- Using Quarto with Positron
- Further Resources
